entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `headline` TEXT NOT NULL, `content` TEXT NOT NULL, `publicationDate` TEXT NOT NULL, `creationTime` TEXT NOT NULL, `updateTime` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_articles_fts_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `articles` BEGIN DELETE FROM `articles_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_articles_fts_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `articles` BEGIN DELETE FROM `articles_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_articles_fts_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `articles` BEGIN INSERT INTO `articles_fts`(`docid`, `headline`, `content`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`headline`, NEW.`content`); END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_articles_fts_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `articles` BEGIN INSERT INTO `articles_fts`(`docid`, `headline`, `content`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`headline`, NEW.`content`); END
entities.createSql: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`headline` TEXT NOT NULL, `content` TEXT NOT NULL, content=`articles`)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `url` TEXT NOT NULL, `articleId` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`articleId`) REFERENCES `articles`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: media_article_id_idx
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `media_article_id_idx` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id`, `articleId`)

indices.name: articles_id_idx
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `articles_id_idx` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`articleId`)

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO room_master_table (id,identity_hash) VALUES(42, 'c337aedfa9f6d4d9c4d42f553dd9269e')
